您的受孕季节可以影响身体的卡路里燃烧能力在寒冷的月份被构想可能会增强身体在一生中燃烧卡路里的能力。一项新的研究表明，冷季的概念与成年期更活跃的棕色脂肪和更大的能量消耗有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/your-season-of-conception-could-could-shape-your-bodye28099s-calorie-burning-burning-ability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/your-season-of-conception-could-could-shape-your-bodyee28099s-calorie-burning-burning-ability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88Ad3ab6-a5b6-40ee-acc4-ACC4-0D2FE43D1BCF Tue, 08 Apr 2025 21:28:00 -0400 Your season of conception could shape your body’s calorie-burning ability
